t: And the LORD{H3068} said{H559}{(H8799)} unto Noah{H5146}, Come{H935}{(H8798)} thou and all thy house{H1004} into the ark{H8392}; for thee have I seen{H7200}{(H8804)} righteous{H6662} before me{H6440} in this{H2088} generation{H1755}.
